text: Bigu ej Pajomʙar ʙa musrikoni qavmat: Man az mijoni digar pajomʙaron naxustin pajomʙar nestam, (ja'ne, pes az man niz digar pajomʙaroni Alloh guzastaand va sumo medoned, pas caro az pajomʙarii man hajron suda inkor mekuned) va namedonam, ki ʙar man jo ʙar sumo dar dunjo ci xohad rasid, cunki ilmi ƣajʙ namedonam. Man az cize cuz on ci ʙa man vahj mesavad, pajravj namekunam va sumoro niz ʙa on amr namekunam va man cuz ʙimdihandai oskore nestam
